instructions: In a large bowl, mix together the cream cheese and maple syrup until blended. Stir in the pineapple, dates and walnuts. Fold in the whipped topping. Chill at least 1 to 2 hours. This salad can be frozen.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Maple Syrup Salad
